    • Constructor Detail

      • RegressionERTGrower

        public RegressionERTGrower(java.lang.Integer k,
                   int nMin,
                   IERTScore<R,N> score)
        Creates a ERTGrower that will create ExtraTrees according to the following parameters. Takes the mean of the labels.
        Parameters:
        k - number of splits to create at each inner node.
        nMin - a leaf is created if |set| <= n_min.
        score - score object used to calculate split scores.
